Mask value is: 00000000 00000110 00000000 00000000
~Mask value is: 11111111 11111001 11111111 11111111
*p & ~mask is: 00000000 00000001 00000000 00001111
((c << 17) & mask) is: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
Value is: 00000000 00000001 00000000 00001111
Output value of 65551 is: 00000000 00000001 00000000 00001111
